data.title: Grindhouse: Planet Terror & Death Proof Film Locations
data.meta_description: See where the movies Grindhouse: Planet Terror & Grindhouse: Death Proof were filmed around Austin. Visit the locations where iconic Austin films and TV shows were made.
data.text:
From major box office hits to cult classics, Austin has provided a spectacular landscape for filmmakers to bring their vision to life. Visitors have flocked to destinations featured in iconic locally made films like "Dazed and Confused" and "The Texas Chainsaw Massacre." With over 50 years of production, there are many film tourism locations in the Austin area to experience including those seen in "Grindhouse."

About "Grindhouse"

"Grindhouse" is presented as a double feature, combining director Robert Rodriguez's "Planet Terror" - an exploitation horror film about a group of survivors who battle zombie-like creatures, and Quentin Tarantino's "Death Proof" - a slasher about a murderous stuntman who kills young women with modified muscle cars. Both films used some very iconic Austin locations.

Details: Dimension Films / Rated R / 191 minutes / Action, Horror, Sci-Fi, Exploitation

Director: Robert Rodriguez / Quentin Tarantino

Cast: Rose McGowan, Freddy Rodriguez, Michael Biehn, Jeff Fahey, Josh Brolin, Marley Shelton, Rosario Dawson, Vanessa Ferlito, Jordan Ladd, Sydney Tamiia Poitier, Tracie Thoms, Mary Elizabeth Winstead, and Zoë Bell

Planet Terror Streaming On: @YouTube, @PrimeVideo, @GooglePlay, @VuduFans, @MicrosoftStore, @iTunes, @Redbox

Death Proof Streaming On: @YouTube, @PrimeVideo, @GooglePlay, @VuduFans, @MicrosoftStore, @iTunes, @Redbox

Locations

Scene: Guero’s Taco Bar

"Death Proof" kicks off with a scene where radio disc jockey Jungle Julia (Poitier), Arlene (Ferlito) and Shanna (Ladd) meet at Guero’s Taco Bar on South Congress and plan their Austin evening.

Location: Guero’s Taco Bar (1412 S Congress Ave, Austin, TX 78704)

Scene: Texas Chili Parlor

Part of the prologue to "Death Proof" was filmed at the Texas Chili Parlor (the real deal for the exteriors and an exact replica set for the interiors), where Quentin Tarantino's character, Lewis, buys a round of Chartreuse shots for Jungle Julia (Poitier), Arlene (Ferlito) and Shanna (Ladd). Stuntman Mike (Russell) also shows up and offers to give Pam (McGowan) a lift home.

Location: Texas Chili Parlor (1409 Lavaca St, Austin, TX 78701)

Scene: Bone Shack BBQ & Jasper’s Farm

Zedler Mill in Luling played two major locations in both parts of Grindhouse. In "Planet Terror," it was a stand-in for the production-designed Bone Shack BBQ, operated by JT (Fahey). And in "Death Proof," it was the Jasper’s Farm backlot where Abbie, Kim, Lee and Zoe (Bell, Dawson, Winstead, and Thoms) check out the Dodge Challenger for sale.

Location: Zedler Mill (1170 S. Laurel Ave, Luling, TX 78648)
